attributes.long-description:
topatoi™ combines unique platform gameplay and pure arcade action to bring an incredible experience right into your living room!

This Bundle contains the 'Great Tree Story', 'Pillar of the Skies' episodes and Arcade Style Pack for the topatoi™ saga. With the main hero Raph, your journey begins from a crash-landing in the world of Great Tree, and your girlfriend kidnapped by the evil Blackwing. Frantic pursuit through 7 chapters of the Great Tree moves you to the all-new mechanical world of the Sky Pillar. Only there you finally get a chance to help Raph save his girlfriend from Blackwing’s grip... Finishing the story missions will gradually unlock 24 extra bonus levels that you may play and coloring yourself!

Take advantage of everything topatoi™ has to offer:
- 14 chapters of Raph's adventures
- 10 unlockable single player bonus levels, 10 unlockable 2 player co-op levels
- 4 split-screen levels
- Two difficulty modes
- Online scoreboard for each level

topatoi™ © 2008-2010 Boolat LLC. Developed by Boolat Games. All rights reserved.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
